_comments._overview: Payments and zap configuration (client-safe). Controls zap presets, limits, and purchase dialog behaviors.
_comments.zap.minCustomZap: Minimum sats for custom zap input.
_comments.zap.noteMaxBytes: Maximum bytes allowed in zap note (fallback when event metadata is missing).
_comments.zap.privacyToggle: Controls visibility of the 'Private zap' toggle.
_comments.zap.privacyToggle.enabled: Show the privacy toggle at all.
_comments.zap.privacyToggle.requireAuth: Only show when the user is authenticated.
_comments.zap.privacyToggle.hideWhenPrivkeyPresent: Hide when the session already has a stored privkey.
_comments.zap.recentZapsLimit: How many recent zaps to list in the sidebar.
_comments.purchase.minZap: Minimum sats enforced in the purchase dialog (fallback if env NEXT_PUBLIC_MIN_ZAP_SATS is absent).
_comments.purchase.autoCloseMs: Delay before closing the purchase dialog after a successful auto-claim.
_comments.purchase.autoShowQr: Automatically reveal QR once an invoice is created.
_comments.purchase.progressBasis: How to compute progress: 'server' uses server-paid only; 'serverPlusViewer' also counts viewer zaps.
_comments.purchase.noteMaxBytes: Maximum bytes for purchase dialog zap note (fallback when event metadata is missing).
